lines.text: You live alone?
No, I, I have a boyfriend. He's a cop!
You don't have a boyfriend.
How do you know?
There's five empty buckets of Häagen-Dazs in your trash, your legs are stubbly and your hair color needs a touch-up.
I want every swingin' dick down there! Pull the noose tight and drop him like a bad habit! This man dies tonight, gentlemen!
Now... Mr. Dunn, you listen here...
No, you listen here. I'm not interested in joining anybody's goon squad. So you and George Forehead over here can just step off.
Where's your telephone?
It's in my bag.
[She stands]
I'll get it. Wouldn't want you to have another Charlie's Angels flashback.
[He finds a stun gun among her things]
It was a gift from my mother. She thinks every psycho in L.A. is coming after me. Who knew?
Shoulda killed me when you had the chance, Dunn. Piss-poor planning on your part. Piss-poor.
Yeah, well, I'm a Marine. We don't plan. We improvise.
Sometimes, I plan shit!
[first lines]
Standby, Sergeant. Target should be coming into sight. Target's in sight. Take him out.
It's a kid, Lieutenant.
We have our orders, Sergeant.
Can't be more than ten years old.
I don't care about his age. Take him out!
I can't...

[draws his pistol]
Goddammit, Sergeant! We have our orders here! Fire, now! Now! Obey my fuckin' order!
Hey, convict. Is it true you won a Navy Cross?
Yeah.
So what'd a piece of shit like you do so brave to deserve a medal?
I fucked your sister.
[Guard #2 laughs]
What're you laughin' at?
I seen your sister!
[Handling an ice bullet, which melts inside the target]
"Ice projectiles." What'll these people think of next? Fruity flavors?
Yo man, these cuffs are a little tight. You think you can loosen 'em up a little bit?
No.
Yeah, well my balls are itchin' real bad. How about you lend me a hand?
Careful, convict. I got orders to shoot to kill.
Me or yourself?
Like you, many of my men are ex-convicts. Take the captain here. When I found him, he was awaiting sentencing in an Iraqi prison for raping a 15-year-old girl.
What's the matter, they don't have sheep in the Middle East?
